FilterItemPortable.Name: Contas com Extrato Banc√°rio
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <TableName xsi:nil="true" /> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.HANDLE IN (SELECT CT.HANDLE FROM FN_CONTASTESOURARIA CT JOIN TS_EXTRATOBANCARIO EB ON EB.CONTA = CT.HANDLE)</Value> <Label xsi:nil="true" /> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT CT.HANDLE FROM FN_CONTASTESOURARIA CT JOIN TS_EXTRATOBANCARIO EB ON EB.CONTA = CT.HANDLE)</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>
